mapper.update:
update HSP_TIM_DIFF
OBJ_NAM = #{objNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DES = #{objDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_ODR = #{objOdr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TIM_BEG_COD = #{timBegCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIM_BEG_NAM = #{timBegNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIM_END_COD = #{timEndCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIM_END_NAM = #{timEndNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TIM_DIF = #{timDif,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_MEM = #{objMem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHG_TIM = #{chgTim,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CHG_USR_NO = #{chgUsrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHG_USR_NAM = #{chgUsrNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DIS_TYP = #{disTyp,jdbcType=CHAR} and OBJ_TYP = #{objTyp,jdbcType=CHAR} and OBJ_ENM = #{objEnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

merge into HSP_TIM_DIFF a using(select #{disTyp,jdbcType=CHAR} DIS_TYP, #{objTyp,jdbcType=CHAR} OBJ_TYP, #{objEnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OBJ_ENM, #{objNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OBJ_NAM, #{objDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OBJ_DES, #{objOdr,jdbcType=DECIMAL} OBJ_ODR, #{timBegCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} TIM_BEG_COD, #{timBegNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR} TIM_BEG_NAM, #{timEndCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} TIM_END_COD, #{timEndNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR} TIM_END_NAM, #{timDif,jdbcType=DECIMAL} TIM_DIF, #{objMem,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OBJ_MEM, #{chgTim,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} CHG_TIM, #{chgUsrNo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} CHG_USR_NO, #{chgUsrNam,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} CHG_USR_NAM from dual)b on(a.DIS_TYP = b.DIS_TYP and a.OBJ_TYP = b.OBJ_TYP and a.OBJ_ENM = b.OBJ_ENM) when matched then update set a.TIM_DIF = b.TIM_DIF when not matched then insert ( DIS_TYP, OBJ_TYP, OBJ_ENM, OBJ_NAM, OBJ_DES, OBJ_ODR, TIM_BEG_COD, TIM_BEG_NAM, TIM_END_COD, TIM_END_NAM, TIM_DIF, OBJ_MEM, CHG_TIM, CHG_USR_NO, CHG_USR_NAM ) values ( #{disTyp,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{objTyp,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{objEnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objOdr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{timBegCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timBegNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timEndCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timEndNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timDif,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objMem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chgTim,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{chgUsrNo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{chgUsrNam,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select:
with temp as (select (select pro_val from HSP_XTZL_INF where pro_code = #{timBegCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and emg_no = emg.emg_seq) begtime, (select pro_val from HSP_XTZL_INF where pro_code = #{timEndCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and emg_no = emg.emg_seq) endtime, to_char(emg.emg_dat, 'yyyy/mm') emg_dat from hsp_emg_inf emg where XTLCFLG = '1' and emg.emg_dat > (sysdate -30) )
select nvl(median(to_date(temp.endtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(temp.begtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*24*60*60,0) timDif from temp

with temp as (select (select pro_val from HSP_XTZL_INF where pro_code = #{timBegCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and emg_no = emg.emg_seq) begtime, (select pro_val from HSP_XTZL_INF where pro_code = #{timEndCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and emg_no = emg.emg_seq) endtime, to_char(emg.emg_dat, 'yyyy/mm') emg_dat from hsp_emg_inf emg where XTLCFLG = '1' and emg.emg_dat > (sysdate -30) )
select nvl(avg(to_date(temp.endtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(temp.begtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*24*60*60,0) timDif from temp

with temp as (select (select pro_val from HSP_XTZL_INF where pro_code = #{timBegCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and emg_no = emg.emg_seq) begtime, (select pro_val from HSP_XTZL_INF where pro_code = #{timEndCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and emg_no = emg.emg_seq) endtime, to_char(emg.emg_dat, 'yyyy/mm') emg_dat from hsp_emg_inf emg where XTLCFLG = '1' and emg.emg_dat > trunc(sysdate, 'yyyy'))
select nvl(median(to_date(temp.endtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(temp.begtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*24*60*60,0) timDif from temp

with temp as (select (select pro_val from HSP_XTZL_INF where pro_code = #{timBegCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and emg_no = emg.emg_seq) begtime, (select pro_val from HSP_XTZL_INF where pro_code = #{timEndCod,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and emg_no = emg.emg_seq) endtime, to_char(emg.emg_dat, 'yyyy/mm') emg_dat from hsp_emg_inf emg where XTLCFLG = '1' and emg.emg_dat > trunc(sysdate, 'yyyy'))
select nvl(avg(to_date(temp.endtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - to_date(temp.begtime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*24*60*60,0) timDif from temp
